titleStmt.title: Cutheberti Tonstalli in laudem matrimonii oratio habita in sponsalibus Mariae potentissimi regis Angliæ Henrici octaui filiæ, et Francisci Christanissimi Francorum regis primogeniti.
In laudem matrimonii oratio
titleStmt.author: Tunstall, Cuthbert, 1474-1559.
